cast.overview: Two years have passed since the final battle with Sephiroth. Though Midgar, city of mako, city of prosperity, has been reduced to ruins, its people slowly but steadily walk the road to reconstruction. However, a mysterious illness called Geostigma torments them. With no cure in sight, it brings death to the afflicted, one after another, robbing the people of their fledgling hope.
cast.title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children

cast.original_title: 劇場版「鬼滅の刃」無限列車編
cast.overview: Tanjiro Kamado, joined with Inosuke Hashibira, a boy raised by boars who wears a boar's head, and Zenitsu Agatsuma, a scared boy who reveals his true power when he sleeps, boards the Infinity Train on a new mission with the Fire Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, to defeat a demon who has been tormenting the people and killing the demon slayers who oppose it!
cast.title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Movie: Mugen Train

details.biography: Megumi Toyoguchi (豊口 めぐみ, Toyoguchi Megumi, January 2, 1978) is a Japanese seiyū (voice actress) from the city of Machida, Tokyo. She is affiliated with 81 Produce.
details.name: Megumi Toyoguchi
